General.Name: iCRAFT Co. Ltd
General.Description: iCRAFT Co., Ltd. operates as an IT company in Korea and internationally. The company offers internet core/access network solutions; internet infra value added services; mobile internet services; storage solutions; internet applications, such as web-cache, web acceleration, and video systems; integrated security services for internet; voice data integration services; traffic management systems; consulting services; block chain services; software defined network solutions; and artificial intelligence solutions. Its principal products include routers, switches, network security solutions, signaling controllers, media gateways, adapters, cables, and other products. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
